alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Chilton; Jefferson; Shelby; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 14 at 6:22AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Bibb, Chilton, Jefferson, Shelby and Tuscaloosa. * WHEN...Until 930 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 622 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hoover, Vestavia Hills, Alabaster, Homewood, Pelham, Mountain Brook, Helena, Calera, Montevallo, Jemison, Indian Springs Village, Brookwood, Coaling, Vance, Woodstock, West Blocton, Wilton, Maylene, University Of Montevallo and American Village.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
